welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pudong, China! Get ready to be enchanted by the modern skyscrapers, bustling markets, and rich cultural heritage this city has to offer. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Pudong has to offer.

restaurants.name: Din Tai Fung (鼎泰丰)
restaurants.description: Din Tai Fung (鼎泰丰) is a dumpling restaurant located in 浦东.
restaurants.address: 100 Century Ave | 世纪大道100号 (3/F-18 SWFC | 上海环球金融中心), Lùjiāzuǐ, 浦东, 上海市, 200120

restaurants.address: 88 Zhangyang Rd (Puming Rd), Lùjiāzuǐ, 浦东, 上海市

restaurants.name: Käfer by The Binjiang One
restaurants.description: Käfer by The Binjiang One is a german restaurant located in 上海市.
restaurants.address: Fucheng Rd, Bingjiang Blvd (at Shibu St), 上海市, 上海市, 200120

restaurants.name: Sproutworks (豆苗工坊)
restaurants.description: Sproutworks (豆苗工坊) is a salad restaurant located in 浦东.
restaurants.address: 168 Lujiazui W Rd | 陆家嘴西路168号 (B2/F Super Brand Mall | 正大广场), Lùjiāzuǐ, 浦东, 上海市, 200120

restaurants.name: Morton's The Steakhouse (莫尔顿海鲜牛排坊)
restaurants.description: Morton's The Steakhouse (莫尔顿海鲜牛排坊) is a steakhouse located in 浦东.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid phone number.
